title: LFT I main support

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
looking for a ranked team that needs a support. Yeah i am bronze 1 but i am on the climb. you can check my previous games (just the roles for support ignore the others) and decide if i am a decent player (the link).

I do have skype- Sup3rd0ughnut 
and im just looking for ways to further improve my supporting ability and trying to improve my skills so i can be as good as my hero aphromoo <3

if interested contact my skype or add me on lol Superdoughnut33

replies.body: i added ya if ur still needing a team
